content: created by the stitch pattern hat finishing with smaller circular needles loosely co 58 74 82 sts work weave in yarn tails machine wash and tumble dry at a low first round of hat stitch pattern and place marker join sts being temperature careful not to twist and continue working stitch pattern for 2 the scarf will gain approximately 2 after washing approximately 10 row change to larger needles and continue to work in stitch pattern until piece measures 9 9 5 10 from cast-on edge being certain to end on a round 2 begin decrease rounds to shape crown on the next round
